item.title: Debugging in PhpStorm with Xdebug locally, in Vagrant or in Docker
item.description: Do you use PhpStorm and have you ever wondered what all those fancy debugging features were? Or could you just not get Xdebug running in Docker or your Vagrant machine? Wonder no more!
